**Your Second Brain On The Web**

Use our smart bookmarks to save anything from anywhere on the web.

We tag, sort and organize all your resources to make it easy to find and share with our AI assistant. Easily share your best resources in our auto assembling collections called Starter Pacs.

Visit www.sidekic.ai to learn more.

*NEW FEATURES*

- Capture screenshots to save it to Sidekic. Use Sidekic Vision to automatically tag and extract information from your images.

- Automatically scrape, tag, and save any webpage you visit into Sidekic

* UPDATE * 

MARCH 04, 2024

- Bug fixes. Tags are now properly generated
- Style changes
